about_the_game:
Through His Eyes is a psychological horror experience that plunges you into the desperate reality of Thomas, a father trapped in a relentless time loop within his own home. In a world where nightmare and reality blur, every door locked and every puzzle solved draws you closer to uncovering the truth behind a haunting mystery and yet, a dark presence is determined to keep you confined. 

The Loop

Find the way to break the cycle, unravel layers of your own history and confront the reality of your situation.

The Enigma

You are trapped in your own house, every loop grows stranger than the last.

Dark Presence

You are not alone... or that is what you think...
Explore the labyrinth of your mind and your home. With each puzzle solved, the narrative deepens, inviting you to challenge your perceptions of truth and reality. Will you have the courage to break the cycle, see through the eyes of the past, and ultimately find a way to save your daughter, Charlotte?
